#run python3 main.py on ./bank_API folder
#usage 

#all stocks names
#http://127.0.0.1:5000/stocks/names

#fetch all stock historical data
#http://127.0.0.1:5000/stocks/data?stock=AAPL&init=&end=
#
#fetch stock data since a date
##http://127.0.0.1:5000/stocks/data?stock=AAPL&init=2022-05-20&end=
#
#fetch stock data between dates
##http://127.0.0.1:5000/stocks/data?stock=AAPL&init=2022-05-20&end=2022-07-01

#http://127.0.0.1:5000/stocks/insert
#{
#	"stocks":[{"stockname": "TEST100",
#             "date_value" :"29/08/2022",
#             "open_value" :10.2,
#             "high_value" :10.5,
#             "low_value" :10.1,
#             "close_value" :10.3,
#             "adj_close_value" :10.3,
#             "volume" :100.5
#					}]	 
#}
